properties.description: Process Vsl Visits only
Manila North Harbor Port Inc
Manila North Harbor Port Inc
to process moves data alone

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Unit_Nbr as string,
		Facility_Id as string,
		Complex_Id as string,
		Yard_Id as string,
		Carrier_Visit_Key as long,
		Event_Type_Id as string,
		Move_Kind as string,
		From_Location as string,
		To_Location as string,
		From_Position_Name as string,
		To_Position_Name as string,
		Carry_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Fetch_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Put_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Fetch_CHE_Id as long,
		Fetch_CHE_Kind as string,
		Carry_CHE_Id as long,
		Carry_CHE_Kind as string,
		Put_CHE_Id as long,
		Put_CHE_Kind as string,
		QC_CHE_Id as long,
		QC_CHE_Kind as string,
		t_carry_complete as timestamp,
		t_put as timestamp,
		t_fetch as timestamp,
		t_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_discharge as timestamp,
		t_carry_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_carry_fetch_ready as timestamp,
		t_carry_put_ready as timestamp,
		dist_carry as short,
		dist_start as short,
		Twin_Fetch as string,
		Twin_Carry as string,
		Twin_Put as string,
		Category_Id as string,
		Freight_Kind_Id as string,
		to_pos_gkey as integer,
		fm_pos_gkey as integer,
		Restow_Reason as string,
		Container_Line_Id as string,
		Container_Line_Role as string,
		pow as string,
		mve_gkey as long,
		ufv_gkey as long,
		Berth_Id as string,
		Goods_And_Ctr_Wt_Kg as double,
		active_ufv as long,
		Requires_Power_Flag as string,
		OOG_Flag as string,
		Shipper_Id as string,
		Consignee_Id as string,
		Commodity_Id as string,
		ATD as timestamp,
		Rehandles as short,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'gti',
	folderPath: 'silver/moves') ~> source1
source1 filter(Event_Type_Id=="UNIT_DISCH" || Event_Type_Id == "UNIT_LOAD") ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Time_Completed_Date_Time = iif(Event_Type_Id== "UNIT_LOAD", iifNull(t_put,t_carry_complete),iifNull(t_fetch,t_discharge))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(Time = toString(Time_Completed_Date_Time,'HH:mm:ss'),
		Date = toDate(toString(Time_Completed_Date_Time,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 aggregate(groupBy(Carrier_Visit_Key,
		pow,
		Date),
	First_Lift = min(Time_Completed_Date_Time),
		Last_Lift = max(Time_Completed_Date_Time),
		Move_Count = countDistinct(mve_gkey)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(WorkTime = Last_Lift-First_Lift,
		Year = iifNull(year(Date),0),
		Month = iifNull(month(Date),0),
		Week = iifNull(weekOfYear(Date),0)) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'gti',
	folderPath: 'gold/qc_cmph',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['Carrier_Visit_Key','pow','Date'],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1

parameters{
	customer as string ("valencia")
}
source(output(
		FacilityId as string,
		{Yard Id} as string,
		CarrierVisitId as string,
		CarrierVisitKey as integer,
		CraneServiceGkey as short,
		{Crane DelayTypeId} as string,
		DelayCategory as string,
		DelayDurationSec as integer,
		DelayStartTime as string,
		CraneDelayGkey as integer,
		CHEId as short,
		CHEShortName as string,
		SrcTable as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['bronze/cranedelay','/bronze/cranedelay/archive'],
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'valencia',
	folderPath: 'bronze/cranedelay',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,' ','_') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
aggregate1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(CraneDelayGkey),
	each(match(name!='CraneDelayGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> aggregate1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'valencia',
	folderPath: 'silver/cranedelays',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['CraneDelayGkey'],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		{date of gang} as string,
		{gang (1st/2nd/3rd/4th)} as short,
		{Call Sign} as string,
		{Vessel name} as string,
		{Imp Voy} as string,
		{Exp Voy} as string,
		{Quay Crane} as short,
		{vessel Ops} as string,
		Zeile as short,
		Category as string,
		{Category description} as string,
		Site as string,
		ID as integer,
		{von Call Sign} as string,
		{von Brcke} as short,
		Team as string,
		Code as string,
		Start as string,
		Stop as string,
		Accounting as string,
		{Aktiv Stunden} as double,
		Zeitsteuerung as string,
		Verz as string,
		{Labour No} as integer,
		Duration as double,
		TDR as string,
		{Operation Report} as integer,
		System as string,
		Reise as integer,
		{aktiv von} as string,
		{aktiv bis} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Stapler B} as boolean,
		{Std Stapler B} as boolean,
		{Letzte nderung} as string,
		VA as short,
		AR as short,
		CB as boolean,
		VC as short,
		ZM as boolean,
		ST as boolean,
		RS as boolean,
		Spr as short,
		{Std VA} as double,
		{Std AR} as double,
		{Std CB} as double,
		{Std VC} as double,
		{Std ZM} as boolean,
		{Std RS} as boolean,
		{ST Std} as boolean,
		{Std Spr} as double,
		Bemerkung as string,
		{Brutto Zeit} as short,
		{Netto Zeit} as boolean,
		Stammcode as string,
		Terminal as string,
		{Dokument Nr} as boolean,
		{new category} as string,
		{desription of activity} as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'eurogatectb',
	folderPath: 'bronze/delays',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> source1
Select2 derive(Start = toString(toTimestamp(Start,'HH:mm'),'HH:mm:ss'),
		Stop = toString(toTimestamp(Stop,'HH:mm'),'HH:mm:ss'),
		Year = year(toDate(date_of_gang, 'dd.MM.yyyy')),
		Month = month(toDate(date_of_gang, 'dd.MM.yyyy')),
		Week = weekOfYear(toDate(date_of_gang, 'dd.MM.yyyy')),
		date_of_gang = toDate(date_of_gang, 'dd.MM.yyyy')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,' ','_') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 select(mapColumn(
		date_of_gang,
		Gang = {gang_(1st/2nd/3rd/4th)},
		Call_Sign,
		Vessel_name,
		Imp_Voy,
		Exp_Voy,
		Quay_Crane,
		vessel_Ops,
		Zeile,
		Category,
		Category_description,
		Site,
		ID,
		von_Call_Sign,
		{von_Brcke},
		Team,
		Code,
		Start,
		Stop,
		Accounting,
		Aktiv_Stunden,
		Zeitsteuerung,
		Verz,
		Labour_No,
		Duration,
		TDR,
		Operation_Report,
		System,
		Reise,
		aktiv_von,
		aktiv_bis,
		Status,
		Stapler_B,
		Std_Stapler_B,
		{Letzte_nderung},
		VA,
		AR,
		CB,
		VC,
		ZM,
		ST,
		RS,
		Spr,
		Std_VA,
		Std_AR,
		Std_CB,
		Std_VC,
		Std_ZM,
		Std_RS,
		ST_Std,
		Std_Spr,
		Bemerkung,
		Brutto_Zeit,
		Netto_Zeit,
		Stammcode,
		Terminal,
		Dokument_Nr,
		new_category,
		desription_of_activity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'eurogatectb',
	folderPath: 'silver/delays',
	truncate: true,
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Unit_Nbr as string,
		Facility_Id as string,
		Complex_Id as string,
		Yard_Id as string,
		Carrier_Visit_Key as long,
		Event_Type_Id as string,

		Put_CHE_Id as long,
		Put_CHE_Kind as string,
		QC_CHE_Id as long,
		QC_CHE_Kind as string,
		t_carry_complete as timestamp,
		t_put as timestamp,
		t_fetch as timestamp,
		t_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_discharge as timestamp,
		t_carry_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_carry_fetch_ready as timestamp,
		t_carry_put_ready as timestamp,
		dist_carry as short,
		dist_start as short,
		Twin_Fetch as string,
		Twin_Carry as string,
		Twin_Put as string,
		Category_Id as string,
		Freight_Kind_Id as string,
		to_pos_gkey as integer,
		fm_pos_gkey as integer,
		Restow_Reason as string,
		Container_Line_Id as string,
		Container_Line_Role as string,
		pow as string,
		mve_gkey as long,
		ufv_gkey as long,
		Berth_Id as string,
		Goods_And_Ctr_Wt_Kg as double,
		active_ufv as long,
		Requires_Power_Flag as string,
		OOG_Flag as string,
		Shipper_Id as string,
		Consignee_Id as string,
		Commodity_Id as string,
		ATD as timestamp,
		Rehandles as short,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'pdports',
	folderPath: 'silver/moves') ~> source1
source1 filter(equals(Carry_CHE_Kind,'ITV') && equals(isNull(Carry_CHE_Id),false()) && equals(isNull(t_carry_complete),false()) && (Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_LOAD' || Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_DISCH')) ~> filter1
aggregate1 window(asc(Carry_CHE_Id, true),
	asc(t_carry_complete, true),
	startRowOffset: -1L,
	endRowOffset: -1L,
	Carry_CHE_Id_PREV = lag(Carry_CHE_Id),
		Event_Type_Id_PREV = lag(Event_Type_Id),
		t_carry_complete_PREV = lag(t_carry_complete)) ~> window1
window1 derive(Cycle_Type = iif(Carry_CHE_Id==Carry_CHE_Id_PREV && dayOfYear(t_carry_complete)==dayOfYear(t_carry_complete_PREV),
(
iif(Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_LOAD',
iif(Event_Type_Id_PREV=='UNIT_LOAD','Half Load Cycle','Discharge to Load Cycle'),
iif(Event_Type_Id_PREV=='UNIT_DISCH','Half Discharge Cycle','Load to Discharge Cycle'))
),
iif(Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_LOAD','Half Load Cycle','Half Discharge Cycle'))) ~> derivedColumn1
derivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
filter1 aggregate(groupBy(mve_gkey),
	each(match(name!='mve_gkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> aggregate1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'pdports',
	folderPath: 'gold/double_cycling',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['mve_gkey'],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1

		Twin_Fetch as string,

		ufv_gkey as long,

source1 filter(Event_Type_Id=="UNIT_DISCH" || Event_Type_Id == "UNIT_LOAD") ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Time_Completed_Date_Time = iif(Event_Type_Id== "UNIT_LOAD", iifNull(t_put,t_carry_complete),iifNull(t_fetch,t_discharge))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(Time = toString(Time_Completed_Date_Time,'HH:mm:ss'),
		Date = toDate(toString(Time_Completed_Date_Time,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 aggregate(groupBy(Carrier_Visit_Key,
		pow,
		Date),
	First_Lift = min(Time_Completed_Date_Time),
		Last_Lift = max(Time_Completed_Date_Time),
		Move_Count = countDistinct(mve_gkey)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(WorkTime = Last_Lift-First_Lift,
		Year = iifNull(year(Date),0),
		Month = iifNull(month(Date),0),
		Week = iifNull(weekOfYear(Date),0)) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1

	)) ~> sink1

Select1 derive(Time_Completed_Date_Time = iif(Event_Type_Id== "UNIT_LOAD", iifNull(t_put,t_carry_complete),iifNull(t_fetch,t_discharge))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(Time = toString(Time_Completed_Date_Time,'HH:mm:ss'),
		Date = toDate(toString(Time_Completed_Date_Time,'yyyy-MM-dd'))) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn6 derive(Shift_Start_Time = iif(Day_Of_Week==1 || Day_Of_Week==7,
    iif(Time>=toString('06:00:00') && Time<toString('12:00:00'),
        toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','06:00:00')),
        iif(Time>=toString('12:00:00') && Time<toString('18:00:00'),
            toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','12:00:00')),
            iif(Time>=toString('18:00:00') && Time<toString('24:00:00'),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','18:00:00')),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(subDays(Date,1)),' ','24:00:00'))))),
    iif(Time>=toString('06:00:00') && Time<toString('14:00:00'),
        toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','06:00:00')),
        iif(Time>=toString('14:00:00') && Time<toString('22:00:00'),
            toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','14:00:00')),
            iif(Time>=toString('22:00:00'),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','22:00:00')),
				toTimestamp(concat(toString(subDays(Date,1)),' ','22:00:00')))))),
		Shift_End_Time = iif(Day_Of_Week==1 || Day_Of_Week==7,
    iif(Time>=toString('06:00:00') && Time<toString('12:00:00'),
        toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','11:59:59')),
        iif(Time>=toString('12:00:00') && Time<toString('18:00:00'),
            toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','17:59:59')),
            iif(Time>=toString('18:00:00') && Time<toString('24:00:00'),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','23:59:59')),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','05:59:59'))))),
    iif(Time>=toString('06:00:00') && Time<toString('14:00:00'),
        toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','13:59:59')),
        iif(Time>=toString('14:00:00') && Time<toString('22:00:00'),
            toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','21:59:59')),
            iif(Time>=toString('22:00:00'),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(addDays(Date,1)),' ','05:59:59')),
				toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','05:59:59'))))))) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn5 aggregate(groupBy(pow,
		Shift_Start_Time,
		Shift_End_Time,
		Shift_Date,
		Shift),
	First_Lift = min(Time_Completed_Date_Time),
		Last_Lift = max(Time_Completed_Date_Time),
		Move_Count = countDistinct(mve_gkey)) ~> Aggregate1
Filter4 derive(WorkTime = Last_Lift-First_Lift,
		Year = iifNull(year(Shift_Date),0),
		Month = iifNull(month(Shift_Date),0),
		Week = iifNull(weekOfYear(Shift_Date),0),
		Pow_No = toInteger(iif(left(pow,2)=='SK',substring(pow, 3),iif(left(pow,1)=='M',substring(pow, 2),'0')))) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 derive(Shift = iif(toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('06:00:00'),1,
iif(toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('14:00:00')||toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('12:00:00'),2,
iif(toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('22:00:00')||toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('18:00:00'),3,4)))) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn2 derive(Day_Of_Week = dayOfWeek(iif(Time<toString('06:00:00'),subDays(Date,1),Date)),
		Shift_Date = iif(Time<toString('06:00:00'),subDays(Date,1),Date)) ~> DerivedColumn6
source3 filter(Code=='BKO' || Code=='MTG'|| Code=='OFF'||Code=='AIT'||Code=='BBK'||Code=='LBR'||Code=='AIL' || Code=='COS'|| Code=='DTW'||Code=='INC'||Code=='LCA'||Code=='MTW'
|| Code=='OTL'||Code=='WCC'||Code=='WEA'||Code=='WTG'||Code=='WVL') ~> Filter3
Aggregate1 filter(pow!='') ~> Filter4
Filter3 derive(Start_datetime = toTimestamp(concat(toString(date_of_gang),' ',Start)),
		Stop_datetime = iif(Stop<Start,toTimestamp(concat(toString(addDays(date_of_gang,1)),' ',Stop)),toTimestamp(concat(toString(date_of_gang),' ',Stop)))) ~> DerivedColumn7
Filter5, Select2 join(Pow_No == Quay_Crane
	&& First_Lift <= Start_datetime
	&& Last_Lift >= Stop_datetime,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> Join2
DerivedColumn7 derive(Delay = Stop_datetime-Start_datetime) ~> DerivedColumn8
aggregate2 derive(Final_WorkTime = WorkTime-iifNull(Delay,0)) ~> DerivedColumn9
DerivedColumn8 select(mapColumn(
		date_of_gang,
		Vessel_name,
		Quay_Crane,
		Code,
		Start,
		Stop,
		Duration,
		desription_of_activity,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week,
		Start_datetime,
		Stop_datetime,
		Delay
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
DerivedColumn4 filter(Pow_No!=0) ~> Filter5
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		pow,
		Shift_Start_Time,
		Shift_End_Time,
		Shift_Date,
		Shift,
		First_Lift,
		Last_Lift,
		Move_Count,
		WorkTime,
		Year = DerivedColumn4@Year,
		Month = DerivedColumn4@Month,
		Week = DerivedColumn4@Week,
		Pow_No,
		date_of_gang,
		Vessel_name,
		Quay_Crane,
		Code,
		Start,
		Stop,
		Duration,
		desription_of_activity,
		Start_datetime,
		Stop_datetime,
		Delay
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 aggregate(groupBy(pow,
		Shift_Start_Time,
		Shift_End_Time,
		Shift_Date,
		Shift,
		First_Lift,
		Last_Lift,
		Move_Count,
		WorkTime,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week,
		Pow_No),
	Delay = sum(Delay)) ~> aggregate2
DerivedColumn9 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'eurogatectb',
	folderPath: 'gold/GMPH',
	truncate: true,
	mergeSchema: true,

	umask: 0777,

	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1

            toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','14:00:00')),
            iif(Time>=toString('22:00:00'),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','22:00:00')),
				toTimestamp(concat(toString(subDays(Date,1)),' ','22:00:00')))))),
		Shift_End_Time = iif(Day_Of_Week==1 || Day_Of_Week==7,
    iif(Time>=toString('06:00:00') && Time<toString('12:00:00'),
        toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','11:59:59')),
        iif(Time>=toString('12:00:00') && Time<toString('18:00:00'),
            toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','17:59:59')),
            iif(Time>=toString('18:00:00') && Time<toString('24:00:00'),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','23:59:59')),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','05:59:59'))))),
    iif(Time>=toString('06:00:00') && Time<toString('14:00:00'),
        toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','13:59:59')),
        iif(Time>=toString('14:00:00') && Time<toString('22:00:00'),
            toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','21:59:59')),
            iif(Time>=toString('22:00:00'),
                toTimestamp(concat(toString(addDays(Date,1)),' ','05:59:59')),
				toTimestamp(concat(toString(Date),' ','05:59:59'))))))) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn5 aggregate(groupBy(pow,
		Shift_Start_Time,
		Shift_End_Time,
		Shift_Date,
		Shift),
	First_Lift = min(Time_Completed_Date_Time),
		Last_Lift = max(Time_Completed_Date_Time),
		Move_Count = countDistinct(mve_gkey)) ~> Aggregate1
Filter4 derive(WorkTime = Last_Lift-First_Lift,
		Year = iifNull(year(Shift_Date),0),
		Month = iifNull(month(Shift_Date),0),
		Week = iifNull(weekOfYear(Shift_Date),0),
		Pow_No = toInteger(iif(left(pow,2)=='SK',substring(pow, 3),iif(left(pow,1)=='M',substring(pow, 2),'0')))) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 derive(Shift = iif(toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('06:00:00'),1,
iif(toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('14:00:00')||toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('12:00:00'),2,
iif(toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('22:00:00')||toString(Shift_Start_Time, 'HH:mm:ss')==toString('18:00:00'),3,4)))) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn2 derive(Day_Of_Week = dayOfWeek(iif(Time<toString('06:00:00'),subDays(Date,1),Date)),
		Shift_Date = iif(Time<toString('06:00:00'),subDays(Date,1),Date)) ~> DerivedColumn6
source3 filter(Code=='BKO' || Code=='MTG'|| Code=='OFF'||Code=='AIT'||Code=='BBK'||Code=='LBR'||Code=='AIL' || Code=='COS'|| Code=='DTW'||Code=='INC'||Code=='LCA'||Code=='MTW'
|| Code=='OTL'||Code=='WCC'||Code=='WEA'||Code=='WTG'||Code=='WVL') ~> Filter3
Aggregate1 filter(pow!='') ~> Filter4
Filter3 derive(Start_datetime = toTimestamp(concat(toString(date_of_gang),' ',Start)),
		Stop_datetime = iif(Stop<Start,toTimestamp(concat(toString(addDays(date_of_gang,1)),' ',Stop)),toTimestamp(concat(toString(date_of_gang),' ',Stop)))) ~> DerivedColumn7
Filter5, Select2 join(Pow_No == Quay_Crane
	&& First_Lift <= Start_datetime
	&& Last_Lift >= Stop_datetime,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'right')~> Join2
DerivedColumn7 derive(Delay = Stop_datetime-Start_datetime) ~> DerivedColumn8
aggregate2 derive(Final_WorkTime = WorkTime-iifNull(Delay,0)) ~> DerivedColumn9
DerivedColumn8 select(mapColumn(
		date_of_gang,
		Vessel_name,
		Quay_Crane,
		Code,
		Start,
		Stop,
		Duration,
		desription_of_activity,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week,
		Start_datetime,
		Stop_datetime,
		Delay
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
DerivedColumn4 filter(Pow_No!=0) ~> Filter5
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		pow,
		Shift_Start_Time,
		Shift_End_Time,
		Shift_Date,
		Shift,
		First_Lift,
		Last_Lift,
		Move_Count,
		WorkTime,
		Year = DerivedColumn4@Year,
		Month = DerivedColumn4@Month,
		Week = DerivedColumn4@Week,
		Pow_No,
		date_of_gang,
		Vessel_name,
		Quay_Crane,
		Code,
		Start,
		Stop,
		Duration,
		desription_of_activity,
		Start_datetime,
		Stop_datetime,
		Delay
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 aggregate(groupBy(pow,
		Shift_Start_Time,
		Shift_End_Time,
		Shift_Date,
		Shift,
		First_Lift,
		Last_Lift,
		Move_Count,
		WorkTime,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week,
		Pow_No),
	Delay = sum(Delay)) ~> aggregate2
DerivedColumn9 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1

		ecEventGkey as long,
		yardGkey as string,
		YardID as string,
		FcyID as string,
		cheKind as string,
		cheName as string,
		cheID as long,
		EcEventTime as timestamp,
		type as short,
		subType as short,
		typeDescription as string,
		fromCheIdName as string,
		ToCheIdName as string,
		unitIdName as string,
		powName as string,
		poolName as string,
		workQueue as string,
		travelDistance as short,
		moveKind as string,
		isTwinMove as string,
		startDistance as short,
		workAssignmentId as double,
		unitReference as string,
		tranId as string,
		locType as string,
		locId as string,
		locSlot as string,
		opsPosId as string,
		unladenLoctype as string,
		unladenLocid as string,
		unladenLocSlot as string,
		ladenLoctype as string,
		ladenLocid as string,
		ladenLocSlot as string,
		lastEstMoveTime as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'cmsa',
	folderPath: 'silver/ecevents') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey,
		YardID,
		FcyID,
		cheKind,
		CHE_Name = cheName,
		CHE_ID = cheID,
		TimeStamp = EcEventTime,
		eventType = type,
		eventSubType = subType,
		eventTypeDescription = typeDescription,
		unit = unitIdName,
		pow = powName,
		pool = poolName,
		workQueue,
		moveKind,
		locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = ladenLocSlot,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select
select filter(cheKind=='ITV' && eventTypeDescription=='CMPL') ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		MoveCount = 1,
		Block = left(locSlot,3),
		Hour = toString(TimeStamp, 'HH'),
		WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
select filter((eventTypeDescription == 'LGOF' || eventTypeDescription == 'LGON') && cheKind == 'ITV') ~> Filter5

)

)

iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')

		Block = left(locSlot,3)) ~> DerivedColumn3
Sort1 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),

	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),

iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))>toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)),iif( 
toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))+1),
(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))), 
iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))+1),

,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))+1) 
,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))))),0)),
		BlockChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)!=left(locSlot_NXT,3),1,0),0),0),0),
		LaneChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,2)!=left(locSlot_NXT,2),1,0),0),0),0)) ~> DerivedColumn6
DerivedColumn4 filter(isNull(WorkTime)==false()) ~> Filter7

properties.description: for TT Productivity report

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ecEventGkey as long,
		yardGkey as string,
		YardID as string,
		FcyID as string,
		cheKind as string,
		cheName as string,
		cheID as long,
		EcEventTime as timestamp,
		type as short,
		subType as short,
		typeDescription as string,
		fromCheIdName as string,
		ToCheIdName as string,
		unitIdName as string,
		powName as string,
		poolName as string,
		workQueue as string,
		travelDistance as short,
		moveKind as string,
		isTwinMove as string,
		startDistance as short,
		workAssignmentId as double,
		unitReference as string,
		tranId as string,
		locType as string,
		locId as string,
		locSlot as string,
		opsPosId as string,
		unladenLoctype as string,
		unladenLocid as string,
		unladenLocSlot as string,
		ladenLoctype as string,
		ladenLocid as string,
		ladenLocSlot as string,
		lastEstMoveTime as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'transnet',
	folderPath: 'silver/ecevents') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey,
		YardID,
		FcyID,
		cheKind,
		CHE_Name = cheName,
		CHE_ID = cheID,
		TimeStamp = EcEventTime,
		eventType = type,
		eventSubType = subType,
		eventTypeDescription = typeDescription,
		unit = unitIdName,
		pow = powName,
		pool = poolName,
		workQueue,
		moveKind,
		locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = ladenLocSlot,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select
select filter(cheKind=='ITV' && eventTypeDescription=='CMPL' && FcyID == 'CTCT') ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		MoveCount = 1,
		Block = left(locSlot,3),
		Hour = toString(TimeStamp, 'HH'),
		WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
select filter((eventTypeDescription == 'LGOF' || eventTypeDescription == 'LGON') && cheKind == 'ITV'&& FcyID == 'CTCT') ~> Filter5
Filter5 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3 derive(WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')))),
		Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		Block = left(locSlot,3)) ~> DerivedColumn3
Sort1 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true),
	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),
		TimeStamp_PREV = lag(TimeStamp),
		TimeStamp_NXT = lead(TimeStamp),
		eventTypeDescription_PREV = lag(eventTypeDescription),
		eventTypeDescription_NXT = lead(eventTypeDescription)) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(LGOF = case(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',case(eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGOF',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT),eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGON',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT-seconds(1)))),(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV)),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON', ShiftEndTime)),
		LGON = case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',TimeStamp),
		WorkTime = toDouble((case(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',case(eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGOF',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT),eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGON',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT-seconds(1)))),(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV)),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON', ShiftEndTime))-case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',TimeStamp))/3600000)) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 sort(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true)) ~> Sort1
Filter6 sort(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true)) ~> Sort2
Sort2 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true),
	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),
		TimeStamp_PREV = lag(TimeStamp),
		TimeStamp_NXT = lead(TimeStamp),
		locSlot_PREV = lag(locSlot),
		locSlot_NXT = lead(locSlot),
		ecEventGkey_PREV = lag(ecEventGkey),
		ecEventGkey_NXT = lead(ecEventGkey),
		ShiftDate_PREV = lag(ShiftDate),
		ShiftDate_NXT = lead(ShiftDate),
		LGON_PREV = lag(LGON),
		LGON_NXT = lead(LGON),
		LGOF_PREV = lag(LGOF),
		LGOF_NXT = lead(LGOF)) ~> Window2
DerivedColumn1, Filter7 join(Aggregate1@CHE_ID == Aggregate3@CHE_ID
	&& DerivedColumn1@ShiftStartTime == DerivedColumn3@ShiftStartTime
	&& DerivedColumn1@ShiftEndTime == DerivedColumn3@ShiftEndTime,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey = Aggregate1@ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey = Aggregate1@yardGkey,
		YardID = Aggregate1@YardID,
		FcyID = Aggregate1@FcyID,
		cheKind = Aggregate1@cheKind,
		CHE_Name = Aggregate1@CHE_Name,
		CHE_ID = Aggregate1@CHE_ID,
		TimeStamp = Aggregate1@TimeStamp,
		eventType = Aggregate1@eventType,
		eventSubType = Aggregate1@eventSubType,
		eventTypeDescription = Aggregate1@eventTypeDescription,
		unit = Aggregate1@unit,
		pow = Aggregate1@pow,
		pool = Aggregate1@pool,
		workQueue = Aggregate1@workQueue,
		moveKind = Aggregate1@moveKind,
		locSlot = Aggregate1@locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot = Aggregate1@unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = Aggregate1@laden_LocSlot,
		Year = Aggregate1@Year,
		Month = Aggregate1@Month,
		Week = Aggregate1@Week,
		Date = DerivedColumn1@Date,
		Time = DerivedColumn1@Time,
		ShiftStartTime = DerivedColumn1@ShiftStartTime,
		ShiftEndTime = DerivedColumn1@ShiftEndTime,
		Shift = DerivedColumn1@Shift,
		ShiftDate = DerivedColumn1@ShiftDate,
		MoveCount,
		Block = DerivedColumn1@Block,
		Hour,
		WeekofYear = DerivedColumn1@WeekofYear,
		{ecEventGkey.1} = Aggregate3@ecEventGkey,
		{ShiftDate.1} = DerivedColumn3@ShiftDate,
		LGOF,
		LGON,
		WorkTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(Valid = iif(TimeStamp>=LGON && TimeStamp<=LGOF,1,0)) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 filter(Valid==1) ~> Filter6
Window2 derive(FirstMove = case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp),
		LastMove = case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp),

		Facility_Id as string,
		Carrier_Visit_Id as string,
		Phase as string,
		Visit_Nbr as string,
		Carrier_Mode as string,
		ATA as timestamp,
		ATD as timestamp,
		ETA as timestamp,
		ETD as timestamp,
		Operator_Line_Id as string,
		Operator_Line_Role as string,
		Operator_Line_Name as string,
		Time_First_Availabilty as string,
		Time_Discharge_Complete as string,
		Service_Id as string,
		Service_Name as string,
		Vessel_Id as string,
		IB_VYG as string,
		OB_VYG as string,
		Carrier_Name as string,
		Vessel_Class as string,
		Published_ETA as string,
		Published_ETD as string,
		Start_Work as string,
		End_Work as string,
		Begin_Receive_Date as string,
		Cargo_Cutoff_Date as string,
		Hazard_Cutoff_Date as string,
		Reefer_Cutoff_Date as string,
		Labor_On_Board_Date as string,
		Labor_Off_Board_Date as string,
		Off_Port_Arrival_Date as string,
		Off_Port_Departure as string,
		Pilot_On_Board_Date as string,
		Pilot_Off_Board_Date as string,
		Est_BBK_Discharge as string,
		Est_BBK_Load as string,
		Est_Load as string,
		Est_Discharge as string,
		Est_Restow as string,
		Est_Shift as string,
		vvFlexString01 as string,
		vvFlexString02 as string,
		vvFlexString03 as string,
		vvFlexString04 as string,
		vvFlexString05 as string,
		vvFlexString06 as string,
		vvFlexString07 as string,
		vvFlexString08 as string,
		vvFlexDate01 as string,
		vvFlexDate02 as string,
		vvFlexDate03 as string,
		vvFlexDate04 as string,
		vvFlexDate05 as string,
		vvFlexDate06 as string,
		vvFlexDate07 as string,
		vvFlexDate08 as string,
		Carrier_Visit_Key as integer,
		Vessel_Classification as string,
		Vessel_Class_Length_Overall_cm as integer,
		Vessel_Class_Beam_cm as short,
		Vessel_TEU_Capacity as string,
		Lloyds_Code as string,
		TimeFirstAvailabilty as timestamp,
		StartWork as timestamp,
		TimeDischargeComplete as timestamp,
		EndWork as timestamp,
		Week as integer,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'tdt',
	folderPath: 'silver/vesselvisits') ~> source2
Select1 filter(equals(Carry_CHE_Kind,'ITV') && (equals(Event_Type_Id,'UNIT_LOAD') || equals(Event_Type_Id, 'UNIT_DISCH'))) ~> Filter1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Yard_Id,
		Carrier_Visit_Key = source1@Carrier_Visit_Key,
		Event_Type_Id,
		Move_Kind,
		From_Location,
		To_Location,
		From_Position_Name,
		To_Position_Name,
		QC_CHE_Id,
		QC_CHE_Kind,
		t_carry_complete,
		t_put,
		t_fetch,
		t_dispatch,
		t_discharge,
		pow,
		Year = source1@Year,
		Month = source1@Month,
		Week = source1@Week,
		mve_gkey,
		Put_CHE_Id,
		Put_CHE_Kind,
		Fetch_CHE_Id,
		Fetch_CHE_Kind,
		Carry_CHE_Id,
		Carry_CHE_Kind,
		Unladen = dist_start,
		Laden = dist_carry,
		Carrier_Name,
		Unit_Nbr
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
aggregate1 alterRow(upsertIf(true()),
	insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1, source2 join(source1@Carrier_Visit_Key == source2@Carrier_Visit_Key,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(mve_gkey),
	each(match(name!='mve_gkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> aggregate1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'tdt',
	folderPath: 'gold/laden_unladen',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: false,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['mve_gkey'],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1

Select1 derive(t_carry_complete = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		t_put = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_put,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		t_fetch = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_fetch,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		t_discharge = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_discharge,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		Fetch_CHE_Id = toLong(Fetch_CHE_Id),
		QC_CHE_Id = toLong(QC_CHE_Id),
		Put_CHE_Id = toLong(Put_CHE_Id),
		Carry_CHE_Id = toLong(Carry_CHE_Id),
		Year = year(coalesce(toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_put,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))),
		Month = month(coalesce(toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_put,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))),
		Week = weekOfYear(coalesce(toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_put,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))),
		t_dispatch = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		t_carry_dispatch = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_carry_dispatch,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_dispatch,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_dispatch,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_dispatch,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_carry_dispatch,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_dispatch,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_dispatch,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		t_carry_fetch_ready = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_carry_fetch_ready,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_fetch_ready,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_fetch_ready,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_fetch_ready,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_carry_fetch_ready,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_fetch_ready,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_fetch_ready,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		t_carry_put_ready = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_carry_put_ready,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_put_ready,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_put_ready,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_put_ready,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_carry_put_ready,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_put_ready,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_put_ready,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		ATD = coalesce(toTimestamp(ATD,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(ATD,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(ATD,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(ATD,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(ATD,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(ATD,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(ATD,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) ~> DataTypeConversion

		Fetch_CHE_Id = toLong(Fetch_CHE_Id),
		QC_CHE_Id = toLong(QC_CHE_Id),
		Put_CHE_Id = toLong(Put_CHE_Id),
		Carry_CHE_Id = toLong(Carry_CHE_Id),

		Fetch_CHE_Id = toLong(Fetch_CHE_Id),
		QC_CHE_Id = toLong(QC_CHE_Id),
		Put_CHE_Id = toLong(Put_CHE_Id),
		Carry_CHE_Id = toLong(Carry_CHE_Id),
		Year = year(coalesce(toTimestamp(t_put,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))),

Aggregate1 derive(t_carry_complete = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'),toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_carry_complete,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),

		t_fetch = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_fetch,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_fetch,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		t_discharge = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_discharge,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_discharge,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),
		Fetch_CHE_Id = toLong(Fetch_CHE_Id),
		QC_CHE_Id = toLong(QC_CHE_Id),
		Put_CHE_Id = toLong(Put_CHE_Id),
		Carry_CHE_Id = toLong(Carry_CHE_Id),
		Year = year(coalesce(toTimestamp(t_put,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'),toTimestamp(t_put,'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_put,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_put,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))),

		t_dispatch = coalesce(toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd-MM-yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd.MM.yy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd/MM/yyyy\'T\'HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(t_dispatch,'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss')),

		yardGkey as string,
		YardID as string,
		FcyID as string,
		cheKind as string,
		cheName as string,
		cheID as long,
		EcEventTime as timestamp,
		type as short,
		subType as short,
		typeDescription as string,
		fromCheIdName as string,
		ToCheIdName as string,
		unitIdName as string,
		powName as string,
		poolName as string,
		workQueue as string,
		travelDistance as short,
		moveKind as string,
		isTwinMove as string,
		startDistance as short,
		workAssignmentId as double,
		unitReference as string,
		tranId as string,
		locType as string,
		locId as string,
		locSlot as string,
		opsPosId as string,
		unladenLoctype as string,
		unladenLocid as string,
		unladenLocSlot as string,
		ladenLoctype as string,
		ladenLocid as string,
		ladenLocSlot as string,
		lastEstMoveTime as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'plipdeco',
	folderPath: 'silver/ecevents') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey,
		YardID,
		FcyID,
		cheKind,
		CHE_Name = cheName,
		CHE_ID = cheID,
		TimeStamp = EcEventTime,
		eventType = type,
		eventSubType = subType,
		eventTypeDescription = typeDescription,
		unit = unitIdName,
		pow = powName,
		pool = poolName,
		workQueue,
		moveKind,
		locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = ladenLocSlot,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select
select filter(cheKind=='RTG' && eventTypeDescription=='CMPL') ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		MoveCount = iif(moveKind=='YARD',iif(left(locSlot,5)==left(laden_LocSlot,5),2,1),1),
		Block = left(locSlot,3),
		Hour = toString(TimeStamp, 'HH'),
		WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
select filter((eventTypeDescription == 'LGOF' || eventTypeDescription == 'LGON') && cheKind == 'RTG') ~> Filter5
Filter5 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3 derive(WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')))),
		Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		Block = left(locSlot,3)) ~> DerivedColumn3
Sort1 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true),
	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),
		TimeStamp_PREV = lag(TimeStamp),
		TimeStamp_NXT = lead(TimeStamp),
		eventTypeDescription_PREV = lag(eventTypeDescription),
		eventTypeDescription_NXT = lead(eventTypeDescription)) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(LGOF = case(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',case(eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGOF',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT),eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGON',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT-seconds(1)))),(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV)),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON', ShiftEndTime)),
		LGON = case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',TimeStamp),
		WorkTime = toDouble((case(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',case(eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGOF',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT),eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGON',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT-seconds(1)))),(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV)),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON', ShiftEndTime))-case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',TimeStamp))/3600000)) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 sort(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true)) ~> Sort1
Filter6 sort(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true)) ~> Sort2
Sort2 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true),
	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),
		TimeStamp_PREV = lag(TimeStamp),
		TimeStamp_NXT = lead(TimeStamp),
		locSlot_PREV = lag(locSlot),
		locSlot_NXT = lead(locSlot),
		ecEventGkey_PREV = lag(ecEventGkey),
		ecEventGkey_NXT = lead(ecEventGkey),
		ShiftDate_PREV = lag(ShiftDate),
		ShiftDate_NXT = lead(ShiftDate),
		LGON_PREV = lag(LGON),
		LGON_NXT = lead(LGON),
		LGOF_PREV = lag(LGOF),
		LGOF_NXT = lead(LGOF)) ~> Window2
DerivedColumn1, Filter7 join(Aggregate1@CHE_ID == Aggregate3@CHE_ID
	&& DerivedColumn1@ShiftStartTime == DerivedColumn3@ShiftStartTime
	&& DerivedColumn1@ShiftEndTime == DerivedColumn3@ShiftEndTime,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey = Aggregate1@ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey = Aggregate1@yardGkey,
		YardID = Aggregate1@YardID,
		FcyID = Aggregate1@FcyID,
		cheKind = Aggregate1@cheKind,
		CHE_Name = Aggregate1@CHE_Name,
		CHE_ID = Aggregate1@CHE_ID,
		TimeStamp = Aggregate1@TimeStamp,
		eventType = Aggregate1@eventType,
		eventSubType = Aggregate1@eventSubType,
		eventTypeDescription = Aggregate1@eventTypeDescription,
		unit = Aggregate1@unit,
		pow = Aggregate1@pow,
		pool = Aggregate1@pool,
		workQueue = Aggregate1@workQueue,
		moveKind = Aggregate1@moveKind,
		locSlot = Aggregate1@locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot = Aggregate1@unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = Aggregate1@laden_LocSlot,
		Year = Aggregate1@Year,
		Month = Aggregate1@Month,
		Week = Aggregate1@Week,
		Date = DerivedColumn1@Date,
		Time = DerivedColumn1@Time,
		ShiftStartTime = DerivedColumn1@ShiftStartTime,
		ShiftEndTime = DerivedColumn1@ShiftEndTime,
		Shift = DerivedColumn1@Shift,
		ShiftDate = DerivedColumn1@ShiftDate,
		MoveCount,
		Block = DerivedColumn1@Block,
		Hour,
		WeekofYear = DerivedColumn1@WeekofYear,
		{ecEventGkey.1} = Aggregate3@ecEventGkey,
		{ShiftDate.1} = DerivedColumn3@ShiftDate,
		LGOF,
		LGON,
		WorkTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(Valid = iif(TimeStamp>=LGON && TimeStamp<=LGOF,1,0)) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 filter(Valid==1) ~> Filter6
Window2 derive(FirstMove = case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp),
		LastMove = case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp),
		IdleTimeFL = case(isNull(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp))==false(),(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp)-LGON)/3600000,isNull(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp))==false(),(LGOF-case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp))/3600000),
		RTGIdleTime = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT && ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif((TimeStamp_NXT-TimeStamp)<0,0.0,toFloat((TimeStamp_NXT-TimeStamp)/3600000)),0.0),
		BayChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)==left(locSlot_NXT,3),iif(left(locSlot,5)!=left(locSlot_NXT,5),1,0),0),0),0),0),
		BayChangeCount = iif(isNull(locSlot_NXT)==true(),0,iif(iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)==left(locSlot_NXT,3),iif(left(locSlot,5)!=left(locSlot_NXT,5),1,0),0),0),0),0)==1,
iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))>toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)),iif( 
toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))+1),
(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))), 
iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))+1),
(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))))
,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,iif(
    toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))+1) 
,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))) 
,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))+1) 
,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))))),0)),
		BlockChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)!=left(locSlot_NXT,3),1,0),0),0),0),
		LaneChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,2)!=left(locSlot_NXT,2),1,0),0),0),0)) ~> DerivedColumn6
DerivedColumn4 filter(isNull(WorkTime)==false()) ~> Filter7
DerivedColumn6 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Filter7 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'plipdeco',

source(output(

		Yard_Id as string,
		Carrier_Visit_Key as integer,

		To_Position_Name as string,
		Carry_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Fetch_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Put_CHE_Operator_Id as string,
		Fetch_CHE_Id as long,
		Fetch_CHE_Kind as string,
		Carry_CHE_Id as long,
		Carry_CHE_Kind as string,
		Put_CHE_Id as long,
		Put_CHE_Kind as string,
		QC_CHE_Id as long,
		QC_CHE_Kind as string,
		t_carry_complete as timestamp,
		t_put as timestamp,
		t_fetch as timestamp,
		t_dispatch as timestamp,
		t_discharge as timestamp,
		t_carry_dispatch as timestamp,

		t_carry_put_ready as timestamp,
		dist_carry as short,
		dist_start as short,
		Twin_Fetch as string,
		Twin_Carry as string,
		Twin_Put as string,
		Category_Id as string,
		Freight_Kind_Id as string,
		to_pos_gkey as integer,
		fm_pos_gkey as integer,
		Restow_Reason as string,
		Container_Line_Id as string,
		Container_Line_Role as string,
		pow as string,
		ufv_gkey as integer,
		Berth_Id as string,
		Goods_And_Ctr_Wt_Kg as string,
		active_ufv as integer,
		Requires_Power_Flag as string,
		OOG_Flag as string,
		Shipper_Id as long,
		Consignee_Id as string,
		Commodity_Id as string,
		ATA as timestamp,
		ATD as timestamp,
		Rehandles as short,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'plipdeco',
	folderPath: 'silver/moves',
	mode: 'read') ~> source1
source1 filter(Move_Kind!="DSCH" && Event_Type_Id=="UNIT_LOAD") ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Tier = iif(length(From_Position_Name)==15 || length(From_Position_Name)==15, right(From_Position_Name, 1),''),
		Slot = iif(length(From_Position_Name)==15 || length(From_Position_Name)==15, dropRight(From_Position_Name, 1),'')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(Tier!='') ~> Filter2
source1 filter(Move_Kind!='DSCH' && Event_Type_Id=='UNIT_YARD_SHIFT') ~> Filter3
Filter3 derive(Tier = iif(length(From_Position_Name)==15 || length(From_Position_Name)==15, right(From_Position_Name, 1),''),
		Slot = iif(length(From_Position_Name)==15 || length(From_Position_Name)==15, dropRight(From_Position_Name, 1),'')) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 filter(Tier!='') ~> Filter4
Filter4 sort(asc(t_put, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		Slot
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(Slot),
	each(match(name!='Slot'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Filter2, Aggregate1 join(DerivedColumn1@Slot == Aggregate1@Slot,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sort(asc(t_put, true)) ~> Sort2
Sort2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1

	validateSchema: false,

	postCommands: [],

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1

properties.description: for TT Productivity report

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ecEventGkey as long,
		yardGkey as string,
		YardID as string,
		FcyID as string,
		cheKind as string,
		cheName as string,
		cheID as long,
		EcEventTime as timestamp,
		type as short,
		subType as short,
		typeDescription as string,
		fromCheIdName as string,
		ToCheIdName as string,
		unitIdName as string,
		powName as string,
		poolName as string,
		workQueue as string,
		travelDistance as short,
		moveKind as string,
		isTwinMove as string,
		startDistance as short,
		workAssignmentId as double,
		unitReference as string,
		tranId as string,
		locType as string,
		locId as string,
		locSlot as string,
		opsPosId as string,
		unladenLoctype as string,
		unladenLocid as string,
		unladenLocSlot as string,
		ladenLoctype as string,
		ladenLocid as string,
		ladenLocSlot as string,
		lastEstMoveTime as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'transnet',
	folderPath: 'silver/ecevents') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey,
		YardID,
		FcyID,
		cheKind,
		CHE_Name = cheName,
		CHE_ID = cheID,
		TimeStamp = EcEventTime,
		eventType = type,
		eventSubType = subType,
		eventTypeDescription = typeDescription,
		unit = unitIdName,
		pow = powName,
		pool = poolName,
		workQueue,
		moveKind,
		locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = ladenLocSlot,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select
select filter(cheKind=='SC' && eventTypeDescription=='CMPL' && FcyID == 'DCT') ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		MoveCount = 1,
		Block = left(locSlot,3),
		Hour = toString(TimeStamp, 'HH'),
		WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))))) ~> DerivedColumn1
select filter((eventTypeDescription == 'LGOF' || eventTypeDescription == 'LGON') && cheKind == 'SC'&& FcyID == 'DCT') ~> Filter5
Filter5 aggregate(groupBy(ecEventGkey),
	each(match(name!='ecEventGkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate3
Aggregate3 derive(WeekofYear = weekOfYear(iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')))),
		Date = toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd')),
		Time = toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss'),
		ShiftStartTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'02:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'08:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'14:00:00')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'20:00:00'))
)
))),
		ShiftEndTime = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'07:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'13:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'19:59:59')),
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('20:00:00'),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(addDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59')),
toTimestamp(concat(concat(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'),' '),'01:59:59'))
)
))),
		Shift = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')>=toString('02:00:00') 
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('08:00:00'),
1,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('08:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('14:00:00'),
2,
iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss') >= toString('14:00:00')
&& toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')< toString('20:00:00'),
3,
4
))),
		ShiftDate = iif(toString(TimeStamp,'HH:mm:ss')<toString('02:00:00'),toDate(toString(subDays(TimeStamp,1),'yyyy-MM-dd')),toDate(toString(TimeStamp,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
		Block = left(locSlot,3)) ~> DerivedColumn3
Sort1 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true),
	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),
		TimeStamp_PREV = lag(TimeStamp),
		TimeStamp_NXT = lead(TimeStamp),
		eventTypeDescription_PREV = lag(eventTypeDescription),
		eventTypeDescription_NXT = lead(eventTypeDescription)) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(LGOF = case(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',case(eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGOF',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT),eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGON',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT-seconds(1)))),(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV)),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON', ShiftEndTime)),
		LGON = case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',TimeStamp),
		WorkTime = toDouble((case(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',case(eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGOF',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT),eventTypeDescription_NXT=='LGON',iif(TimeStamp_NXT>ShiftEndTime,ShiftEndTime,TimeStamp_NXT-seconds(1)))),(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT && (CHE_ID==CHE_ID_PREV || CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV)),case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON', ShiftEndTime))-case(eventTypeDescription=='LGON',TimeStamp))/3600000)) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 sort(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true)) ~> Sort1
Filter6 sort(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true)) ~> Sort2
Sort2 window(asc(yardGkey, true),
	asc(CHE_ID, true),
	asc(TimeStamp, true),
	CHE_ID_PREV = lag(CHE_ID),
		CHE_ID_NXT = lead(CHE_ID),
		TimeStamp_PREV = lag(TimeStamp),
		TimeStamp_NXT = lead(TimeStamp),
		locSlot_PREV = lag(locSlot),
		locSlot_NXT = lead(locSlot),
		ecEventGkey_PREV = lag(ecEventGkey),
		ecEventGkey_NXT = lead(ecEventGkey),
		ShiftDate_PREV = lag(ShiftDate),
		ShiftDate_NXT = lead(ShiftDate),
		LGON_PREV = lag(LGON),
		LGON_NXT = lead(LGON),
		LGOF_PREV = lag(LGOF),
		LGOF_NXT = lead(LGOF)) ~> Window2
DerivedColumn1, Filter7 join(Aggregate1@CHE_ID == Aggregate3@CHE_ID
	&& DerivedColumn1@ShiftStartTime == DerivedColumn3@ShiftStartTime
	&& DerivedColumn1@ShiftEndTime == DerivedColumn3@ShiftEndTime,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ecEventGkey = Aggregate1@ecEventGkey,
		yardGkey = Aggregate1@yardGkey,
		YardID = Aggregate1@YardID,
		FcyID = Aggregate1@FcyID,
		cheKind = Aggregate1@cheKind,
		CHE_Name = Aggregate1@CHE_Name,
		CHE_ID = Aggregate1@CHE_ID,
		TimeStamp = Aggregate1@TimeStamp,
		eventType = Aggregate1@eventType,
		eventSubType = Aggregate1@eventSubType,
		eventTypeDescription = Aggregate1@eventTypeDescription,
		unit = Aggregate1@unit,
		pow = Aggregate1@pow,
		pool = Aggregate1@pool,
		workQueue = Aggregate1@workQueue,
		moveKind = Aggregate1@moveKind,
		locSlot = Aggregate1@locSlot,
		unladenLocSlot = Aggregate1@unladenLocSlot,
		laden_LocSlot = Aggregate1@laden_LocSlot,
		Year = Aggregate1@Year,
		Month = Aggregate1@Month,
		Week = Aggregate1@Week,
		Date = DerivedColumn1@Date,
		Time = DerivedColumn1@Time,
		ShiftStartTime = DerivedColumn1@ShiftStartTime,
		ShiftEndTime = DerivedColumn1@ShiftEndTime,
		Shift = DerivedColumn1@Shift,
		ShiftDate = DerivedColumn1@ShiftDate,
		MoveCount,
		Block = DerivedColumn1@Block,
		Hour,
		WeekofYear = DerivedColumn1@WeekofYear,
		{ecEventGkey.1} = Aggregate3@ecEventGkey,
		{ShiftDate.1} = DerivedColumn3@ShiftDate,
		LGOF,
		LGON,
		WorkTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(Valid = iif(TimeStamp>=LGON && TimeStamp<=LGOF,1,0)) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 filter(Valid==1) ~> Filter6
Window2 derive(FirstMove = case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp),
		LastMove = case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp),
		IdleTimeFL = case(isNull(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp))==false(),(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_PREV,TimeStamp,LGON!=LGON_PREV,TimeStamp)-LGON)/3600000,isNull(case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp))==false(),(LGOF-case(CHE_ID!=CHE_ID_NXT,TimeStamp,LGOF!=LGOF_NXT,TimeStamp))/3600000),
		ITVIdleTime = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT && ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT && ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif((TimeStamp_NXT-TimeStamp)<0,0.0,toFloat((TimeStamp_NXT-TimeStamp)/3600000)),0.0),
		BayChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)==left(locSlot_NXT,3),iif(left(locSlot,5)!=left(locSlot_NXT,5),1,0),0),0),0),0),
		BayChangeCount = iif(isNull(locSlot_NXT)==true(),0,iif(iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)==left(locSlot_NXT,3),iif(left(locSlot,5)!=left(locSlot_NXT,5),1,0),0),0),0),0)==1,
iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))>toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)),iif( 
toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))+1),
(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))),

(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))))
,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))%2==0,iif(

,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2))-1)-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))) 
,iif(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))%2==0,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2))+1) 
,(toInteger(substring(locSlot_NXT,4,2)))-(toInteger(substring(locSlot,4,2)))))),0)),
		BlockChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,3)!=left(locSlot_NXT,3),1,0),0),0),0),
		LaneChangeInstance = iif(CHE_ID==CHE_ID_NXT,iif(ecEventGkey!=ecEventGkey_NXT,iif(ShiftDate==ShiftDate_NXT && LGON==LGON_NXT && LGOF==LGOF_NXT,iif(left(locSlot,2)!=left(locSlot_NXT,2),1,0),0),0),0)) ~> DerivedColumn6
DerivedColumn4 filter(isNull(WorkTime)==false()) ~> Filter7
